p: From a public health perspective, the upward trajectory of COVID-19 in African countries with weaker health systems is worrying. Although in principle, many African countries have expressed their readiness to manage COVID-19, which is commendable, however, practical and proactive measures regarding the availability of the rapid testing equipment, masks and protective wear for health workers is desirable. Furthermore, the respective countriesâ€™ Health Departments need to recruit more health workers to treat and manage patients in hospitals.
